Unlock the mysteries of the tarot through our powerful API

Getting Started

Welcome to the Arcana API, your gateway to the mystical world of tarot readings. Our API provides access to a comprehensive database of tarot cards, including their meanings, symbolism, and interpretations.

Base URL: https://api.arcana.dev/v1

Endpoints

GET /cards

Retrieve a list of all tarot cards in the deck

{
  "cards": [
    {
      "id": "fool",
      "name": "The Fool",
      "arcana": "major",
      "suit": null,
      "number": 0
    },
    // ... more cards
  ]
}
GET /cards/:id

Get detailed information about a specific tarot card

{
  "id": "fool",
  "name": "The Fool",
  "arcana": "major",
  "suit": null,
  "number": 0,
  "meanings": {
    "upright": ["New beginnings", "Innocence", "Adventure"],
    "reversed": ["Recklessness", "Risk-taking", "Second-guessing"]
  },
  "description": "The Fool represents new beginnings, having faith in the future..."
}
GET /readings/daily

Get a random daily card reading

{
  "date": "2024-03-21",
  "card": {
    "name": "The High Priestess",
    "position": "upright",
    "interpretation": "Trust your intuition today..."
  }
}
